entry.tran: 保全面子的;挽回面子的
entry.def: A face-saving action is one which prevents damage to your reputation or the loss of people's respect for you.

example.ex: The decision appears to be a face-saving compromise which will allow the government to remain in office.
example.tran: 这个决定看来是一种保全面子的妥协，让政府不至于下台。
